concept.title: Starting, Stopping, and Restarting SenSage AP Components

conbody.p: To start, stop and restart SenSage AP components:

ol.li: From the Deployment Manager Dashboard, select the Services tab.

In the Summary area of the Services tab, start and stop any of the components using the start and stop icons. If any component or service is stopped, the start icon will be displayed. For details on status icons, see .
